items.title: Trump’s rush for Ukraine peace deal may leave details up to Putin
items.description: The U.S. president declared Saturday that he would forego his previous demand for an initial ceasefire, making it easier for Putin to continue the war...

items.title: Trump drops ceasefire demand for Ukraine war, tells allies Putin wants land
items.description: Trump’s swerve increases pressure on the Ukrainian leader as he heads to the White House on Monday to make his case.

items.title: Key takeaways from Trump-Putin summit and dramatic ceasefire reversal
items.description: President Trump dropped his demand for an immediate ceasefire in Ukraine after meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin. Here are five takeaways ...

items.title: We drove Trump’s D.C. Turns out, he may not be seeing much.
items.description: Washington Post reporters retraced some of the president’s motorcade routes through the nation’s capital. Here’s what we saw.

items.title: Dallas ended downtown homelessness. White House wants to change the rules.
items.description: The new push focuses on temporary, emergency shelters rather than lasting supports and would cut people off services after two years.
